parameters.query: INSERT INTO tool_calls (tool_call_id, session_id, intent_id, function_name, parameters, status, callback_url, created_at) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, 'query_vector_db', $4::jsonb, 'EXECUTING', $5, NOW()) RETURNING *;

parameters.jsonBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ status: 'QUERYING', gate: 1, cancellable: true, tool_call_id: $('Code: Generate ID').first().json.tool_call_id, intent_id: $('Code: Generate ID').first().json.intent_id, message: 'Querying vector database...' }) }}

parameters.query: UPDATE tool_calls SET status = $1, completed_at = NOW() WHERE tool_call_id = $2 RETURNING *;

parameters.jsonBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ status: 'CANCELLED', gate: 0, tool_call_id: $('Code: Generate ID').first().json.tool_call_id, intent_id: $('Code: Generate ID').first().json.intent_id, voice_response: 'Vector database query cancelled.' }) }}

parameters.query: INSERT INTO session_context (session_id, context_key, context_value, expires_at) VALUES ($1, 'last_query_results', $2::jsonb, NOW() + INTERVAL '1 hour') ON CONFLICT (session_id, context_key) DO UPDATE SET context_value = $2::jsonb, expires_at = NOW() + INTERVAL '1 hour' RETURNING *;
UPDATE tool_calls SET status = 'COMPLETED', result = $1::jsonb, voice_response = $2, completed_at = NOW() WHERE tool_call_id = $3 RETURNING *;

options.queryReplacement: {{ JSON.stringify($('Code: Format Results').first().json.result) }}, {{ $('Code: Format Results').first().json.voice_response }}, {{ $('Code: Format Results').first().json.tool_call_id }}

parameters.jsonBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ status: 'COMPLETED', gate: 2, tool_call_id: $('Code: Format Results').first().json.tool_call_id, intent_id: $('Code: Format Results').first().json.intent_id, context_available: true, context_key: 'last_query_results', result: $('Code: Format Results').first().json.result, voice_response: $('Code: Format Results').first().json.voice_response }) }}
